attributes.action: Get bulgarian authorities to order a re-trial in the case of Michaels Shields wrongful imprisonment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How can our government sit back and watch an innocent man remain jailed for 10 years for a crime that another man has admitted to. Its for reasons like this we have politicians to achieve things that the ordinary citizens of Britain cannot.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
